actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require reports of committees to contain estimates of the costs to both public and nonpublic sectors.

summary.text: Requires reports accompanying each bill or joint resolution in the House of Representatives of a public character (except revenue measures) reported by a committee to contain estimates of the costs, to both public and nonpublic sectors, of carrying out the measure reported.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require reports of committees to contain estimates of the costs to both public and nonpublic sectors.
